casebody.data:
THEODORE MURNICK AND MAXINE MURNICK, HIS WIFE, PLAINTIFFS-APPELLANTS, v. CITY OF ASBURY PARK, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Submitted October 25, 1983 Decided December 12, 1983.

Before Judges BOTTER, PRESSLER and O’BRIEN.

Hannoch, Weisman, Stern, Besser, Berkowitz & Kinney, P.A., for appellants (Cari G. Weisenfeld and Paul H. Brownstein, of counsel and on the brief). Rosenblum & Rosenblum, for respondent (Edward G. Rosenblum, of counsel and on the brief). PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed substantially for the reasons stated in Judge Andrew’s reported opinion, 5 N.J.Tax 406 (1983).
